roleset.name: take off
roleset.note: DETACH-V NOTES: Frames file for 'detach' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 23.3, Framenet entry 23.3. (from detach.01-v predicate notes)
DETACHMENT-N NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to detach.01. Detach is a member of VN class disassemble-23.3. Framed by Katie. (from detachment.01-n)

example.name: passive
example.text: They set up [absurd situations]-1, detached *trace*-1 from reality, and then try to reason from them.

example.name: with agent
example.text: John can detach his nose from his face. Ewwww.

example.name: arg 1
example.text: Retinal detachment is a disorder of the eye in which the retina peels away from its underlying layer of support tissue.
